message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $1500000.

Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $1500000. I would like to propose an offer of $1200000 to see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.
